PPLoc: Hardcopy available through office of Senior Vice President Human Resources or through local Human Resources offices
activities: The Company collects and uses personal data regarding the employees of its EU subsidiaries and locations for the following purposes: (a) to facilitate the performance of certain administrative tasks and functions relating to general employment, such as, providing compensation, benefits and related services, updating organizational information, making employment-related decisions and providing employee training; and (b) processing and investigating reports under the Company's Code of Business Conduct & Ethics, or one or more Company policies.
